author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Get a free 15-day trial of Odoo’s all-in-one business solution and see how it can make your life easier! Check it out at https://www.odoo.com/ltt

It’s back-to-school 2025, and our kids need new laptops. We cover a wide range of topics including different types of Chromebooks (affordable, budget, for kids), Chrome OS features (Android apps, Steam, Flex, AI with Gemini), hardware specifications (Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3, RAM, storage, display), and general laptop characteristics (lightweight, long battery life, reliable, productivity). 

Check out the Chromebooks (or equivalent) from the video: 
HP 14" 2-in-1 Full HD Touch-Screen, Intel Core i3, 8GB Memory, 256GB UFS: https://geni.us/d3LFCG
ASUS CX34 14" Intel Core 3, 8GB RAM, 128GB eMMC: https://geni.us/4we6M8m
ASUS CM14 Flip 14" Mediatek Kompanio 520, 8GB RAM,  64GB eMMCs: https://geni.us/6Nbblt2
Lenovo Slim 3 14" FHD Touchscreen, MediaTek Kompanio 520, 4GB RAM, 128GB: https://geni.us/tXtmY
Lenovo Slim 3 14" FHD Touchscreen, MediaT
title: We are being Forced to Buy Chromebooks
